meanings.definition: A person who makes comments or observations.
meanings.sent1: The remarkers in the audience shared their thoughts after the play.
meanings.sent2: The remarkers on social media had a lot to say about the new movie.
meanings.sent3: The remarkers at the party kept the conversation lively and engaging.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of remarkers, always ready with a witty comment.
meanings.sent5: The remarkers in the book club made reading even more enjoyable with their insights.

meanings.definition: Those who make remarks or comments.
meanings.sent1: The remarkers in the meeting had valuable input to share.
meanings.sent2: The remarkers in the class discussion raised interesting points.
meanings.sent3: The remarkers at the restaurant debated over the best dish on the menu.
meanings.sent4: Among the remarkers, his voice stood out for its clarity and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The remarkers in the group chat kept the conversation lively and engaging.
